verbs.description: [ARG0: China] [V: vowed] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] [ARG1: to retaliate] [ARGM-TMP: after U.S. President Donald Trump threatened to impose a 10 percent tariff on $ 200 billion of Chinese goods in an escalation of the trade conflict between the world 's two biggest economies] .

[ARG0: China] vowed Tuesday to [V: retaliate] after U.S. President Donald Trump threatened to impose a 10 percent tariff on $ 200 billion of Chinese goods in an escalation of the trade conflict between the world 's two biggest economies .

China vowed Tuesday to retaliate after [ARG0: U.S. President Donald Trump] [V: threatened] [ARG1: to impose a 10 percent tariff on $ 200 billion of Chinese goods in an escalation of the trade conflict between the world 's two biggest economies] .

China vowed Tuesday to retaliate after [ARG0: U.S. President Donald Trump] threatened to [V: impose] [ARG1: a 10 percent tariff on $ 200 billion of Chinese goods] [ARGM-LOC: in an escalation of the trade conflict between the world 's two biggest economies] .
